Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientGameController

public class Cli
extends ClientGameController

      Method that handle the standard up and down arrows construct
      Parameters:
      keyboard - Keyboard value returned by the key pressed by the user
      counter - Old counter value we want to update
      firstPosition - First position boolean value (if it is on the beginning of the available options list)
      lastPosition - Last position boolean value (if it is on the end of the available options list)
      Returns:
      counter Updated counter value
